Rooms are fitted with a mini-bar, tea/coffee-making facilities and TV with cable channels. Private bathrooms include free toiletries and shower facilities. Guests can get a relaxing massage or head to the gym for a workout session.The hotel has a business center and 24-hour front desk. Garden Permata Hotel is a 15-minute drive from Husein Sastranegara Airport as well as Bandung Train Station. Garden View Restaurant serves a selection of Indonesian, Chinese and international specialties. Live entertainment can be enjoyed nightly at Panorama Bar and Lounge. Sukajadi is a great choice for travelers interested in culturally diverse food, scenery and food shopping.

name: Dago 207
address: Jl. Ir. H. Juanda No.207, 40135 Bandung, Indonesia
description: Located just a 5-minute drive from the fashionable factory outlets in Dago area, Dago 207 offers cozy and homey accommodations with free WiFi access throughout the entire property and free on-site parking space for guests who drive. It takes a 15-minute drive from the property to the historic Gua Jepang, and a 20-minute drive to Cihampelas Walk Shopping Mall. Getting to Husein Sastranegara International Airport will take around 45 minutes by car. All rooms at Dago 207 are air-conditioned and fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, an electric kettle and complimentary bottles of mineral water. Each one also comes with an private bathroom featuring hot and cold shower facility and free toiletries. Daily housekeeping, shared lounge and shared kitchen can be found at this property. There are also an on-site minimarket and breakfast is served in the room. For more dining option, guests can explore the surrounding area where various restaurants and cafes can be found just a 10-minute drive from the property.

name: Neo MORITZ Homestay
address: Jl. Kebon Jati No. 35 Luxor Permai Complex Behind the Market, 40181 Bandung, Indonesia
description: With Stasiun Hall Bus Terminal reachable in a 4-minute walk, neo MORITZ Homestay has accommodations, a restaurant, a garden, a bar and a terrace. Guests wishing to travel light can make use of Towels/Sheets (extra fee). A halal breakfast is available every morning at the family stay. Merdeka Palace is a 17-minute walk from neo MORITZ Homestay, while Braga City Walk is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Husein Sastranegara Airport, 5.1 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Cemerlang
address: Jalan HOS. Tjokroaminoto No 45 (Pasirkaliki), 40171 Bandung, Indonesia
description: Offering air-conditioned rooms in the Ciroyom district of Bandung, Hotel Cemerlang is a 20-minute walk from Stasiun Hall Bus Terminal. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi. The property is 3.9 km from Riau Street and 4 km from Gedung Sate. At the hotel, each room has a desk, a TV and a private bathroom. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Hotel Cemerlang offers a continental or buffet breakfast. Cihampelas Walk is 3.4 km from the accommodation, while Braga City Walk is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Husein Sastranegara Airport, 4.3 km from Hotel Cemerlang.

name: Hotel Citradream Bandung
address: Jl. Pasir Kaliki No. 36 - 42, 40171 Bandung, Indonesia
description: Located right in the heart of Bandung, Hotel Citradream Bandung provides cozy accommodations featuring modern and contemporary design, free Wi-Fi access in all areas of the property and free parking for guests who drive. It takes a 10-minute drive from the property to the famed Cihampelas area, and a 15-minute drive to the lively Dago area. The highlands of Lembang is reachable within a 45-minute drive, and getting to Husein Sastranegara International Airport will take around 30 minutes by car. Each room here includes a TV, air conditioning and a sitting area. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with free toiletries and slippers. You can enjoy city view from the room. Extras include satellite channels. At Hotel Citradream Bandung there's a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities available at the property include luggage storage. For dining option, The Flavour Restaurant is available on-site and serves a range of Indonesian and International dishes. Alternatively, guests can explore the surrounding area where various restaurants can be found at Istana Plaza which is just a 5-minute walk away.

name: Grand Sovia Hotel
address: Jl. Kebon Kawung no. 16, 40171 Bandung, Indonesia
description: Operating a 24-hour front desk, Grand Sovia Hotel is located in Bandung. It features a swimming pool and complimentary WiFi access throughout. Fitted with wooden flooring, the air conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, soundproofing and a wardrobe. Private bathroom comes with slippers and hairdryer. Castell Cafe, located on-site, serves a selection of Indonesian and Western cuisine. Alternatively, guests may order from the room service. The friendly staff at Grand Sovia Hotel can assist with car hire, laundry and dry cleaning services. Relaxing massage is available at the spa and wellness center. Other facilities offered on-site include a concierge service, meeting rooms and fax/photocopying facilities. The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Cihampelas Walk, Bandung Indah Plaza and Husein Sastranegara International Airport.

name: Mogens Guesthouse
address: Jalan Kebon Sirih Nomor 26, Sumurbandung, 40117 Bandung, Indonesia
description: Located in Bandung and within 1.8 km of Braga City Walk, Mogens Guesthouse has a garden, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi. The property is around 1.9 km from Stasiun Hall Bus Terminal, 2.4 km from Merdeka Palace and 2.6 km from Riau Street. The property has a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space for guests. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while some rooms at the guesthouse also have a seating area. Guests at Mogens Guesthouse can enjoy an Asian breakfast. Gedung Sate is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Cihampelas Walk is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Husein Sastranegara Airport, 5.3 km from Mogens Guesthouse. Sumurbandung is a great choice for travelers interested in clothes shopping, culturally diverse food and local food.

name: RedDoorz Premium @ Ciumbuleuit Atas
address: Jl. Ciumbeleuit no 152, 40142 Bandung, Indonesia
description: RedDoorz Premium @ Ciumbuleuit Atas features air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV in the Ciumbuleuit district of Bandung. The property is around 3.2 km from Villa Isola, 3.2 km from Cihampelas Walk and 5.5 km from Gedung Sate. The hotel provides an outdoor pool, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available. Riau Street is 6.3 km from the hotel, while Braga City Walk is 6.9 km away. The nearest airport is Husein Sastranegara Airport, 8 km from RedDoorz Premium @ Ciumbuleuit Atas.

name: De Batara Hotel
address: Jl. Cihampelas no. 112, Bandung Wetan, 40131 Bandung, Indonesia
description: In a great location in the center of Bandung City, De Batara Hotel provides modern comfort just a 5-minute walk from Cihampelas Walk. It houses 2 dining options, tour desk and air-conditioned rooms with free internet access. De Batara Hotel is a 5-minute drive from Rumah Mode Factory Outlet, 10-minute drive from Bandung Train Station and a 15-minute drive from Husein Sastranegara Airport. An airport shuttle service is provided for a fee. Pleasantly decorated in green tones, each room is fitted with a safe, flat-screen cable TV and an electric kettle. A sofa is available in select units, and a private bathroom with free bath amenities is available in all rooms. Newspapers and luggage storage facilities are provided at the 24-hour front desk. The staff can assist with valet parking and laundry requests. Car rental and day trips can be arranged at the tour desk. Cempaka Restaurant specializes in Western and Asian delights, and Kemuning Food Corner serves light meals and beverages. Meals may also be delivered to guests’ rooms. Bandung Wetan is a great choice for travelers interested in local food, clothes shopping and relaxation.

name: Hemangini Hotel Bandung
address: Jl. Setiabudhi No. 66, 40141 Bandung, Indonesia
description: Set in Bandung, Hemangini Hotel Bandung offers accommodations with air conditioning and free WiFi access. The property is located 1 mi from Cihampelas Walk and 1.4 mi from Villa Isola. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. All guest rooms at Hemangini Hotel Bandung come with a seating area where you can relax. The rooms comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge and a kettle. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower. A Continental breakfast is served every morning at the property. Meals can be taken at the on-site restaurant and guests can order room service to dine in the comfort of their rooms. Gedung Sate is 2 mi from Hemangini Hotel Bandung, while Riau Street is 2.4 mi away. Husein Sastranegara Airport is 1.9 mi from the property.

name: Vio Cihampelas
address: Jl. Cihampelas No. 108, 40116 Bandung, Indonesia
description: A 3-minute walk from Cihampelas Walk and the well-known jeans center in Cihampelas, Vio Cihampelas provides a 24-hour front desk and complimentary parking. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the property. Featuring a city view, the air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV, safe and desk. Private bathroom comes with a shower, slippers and free toiletries. Various eateries around Cihampelas area can be found within a 3-minute walk from the property. A mini-market is located a short walk away. Vio Cihampelas is a 10-minute drive from Paris Van Java, a 15-minute drive from Husein Sastranegara International Airport and a 60-minute drive from Tangkuban Perahu Mountain.

name: OYO 260 Home 33
address: Jl. Terusan Babakan Jeruk IV No.33, Sukagalih, Sukajadi, 40163 Bandung, Indonesia
description: Located in Bandung, 4.5 km from Villa Isola, OYO 260 Home 33 has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. All rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Local points of interest like Riau Street and Braga City Walk are reachable within 5.8 km and 4.2 miles, respectively. Staff speak English and Indonesian at the 24-hour front desk. Gedung Sate is 5.1 km from the hotel, while Cihampelas Walk is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Husein Sastranegara Airport, 2.1 km from OYO 260 Home 33. Sukajadi is a great choice for travelers interested in culturally diverse food, scenery and food shopping.

name: D&D Backpackers Guesthouse
address: Jalan Hegarsari III No.10, 40141 Bandung, Indonesia
description: Located in Bandung and with Villa Isola reachable within 1.4 miles, D&D Backpackers Guesthouse provides a ticket service, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property is around 3.2 km from Cihampelas Walk, 6 km from Gedung Sate and 6.3 km from Riau Street. The property has a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and currency exchange for guests. At the guesthouse, each room comes with a desk. At D&D Backpackers Guesthouse, each room includes a seating area. The accommodation has a terrace. Braga City Walk is 6.6 km from D&D Backpackers Guesthouse, while Merdeka Palace is 7.1 km away. The nearest airport is Husein Sastranegara, 6.8 km from the guesthouse, and the property offers a Airport shuttle (additional charge).

name: Neo Dipatiukur Bandung
address: Jl. Dipatiukur no. 72 - 74, 40132 Bandung, Indonesia
description: Operating a 24-hour front desk, Neo Dipatiukur Bandung is located a 15-minute drive from Bandung city center. Free WiFi access is available in this hotel. The elegant air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, a personal safe and a seating area. There is also an electric kettle, tea/coffee making facilities, and a refrigerator with mini-bar. Private bathroom comes with a hot and cold shower facility, hairdryer and slippers. Guests can enjoy sampling Indonesian, western and oriental food at Noodles Now. Neo Dipatiukur Bandung features meeting/banqueting facilities and room service. The concierge service can assist with free luggage storage and valet parking. Other facilities offered include laundry and daily housekeeping. Airport transfer service is available at an extra cost. The hotel is a 15-minute drive from both Bandung Istana Plaza and Dago Pakar area. Husein Sastranegara Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

name: POP! Hotel Festival Citylink
address: Jl. Peta 241, Kopo, 40323 Bandung, Indonesia
description: Directly connected to the Festival Citylink Mall and HARRIS Grand Convention Center, POP! Bandung Hotel offers modern rooms with flat-screen TVs and laptop safes. It has vending machines and free WiFi throughout the hotel. POP! Hotel Bandung Festival CTLink is a 25-minute drive from the Bandung Train Station and the city center. Husein Sastranegara InternationalAirport is also a 15-minute drive away. The hotel has easy access to Asia Africa Museum, Alun-Alun, Riau Street, and Bandung Grand Mosque. All rooms are air conditioned and feature warm lighting and colorful interiors. They are well equipped with an private bathroom and free toiletries, as well as an LCD TV with satellite channels. Guests can enjoy the on-site 24-hour PITSTOP cafe.

name: OYO 569 Cigadung Residence
address: Jl. Cigadung Raya Tengah No.28, Cigadung, Cibeunying Kaler, 40191 Bandung, Indonesia
description: Located in Bandung, 4 km from Riau Street, OYO 569 Cigadung Residence features views of the mountain. The property is around 4.2 km from Gedung Sate, 4.7 km from Saung Angklung Udjo and 5.1 km from Cihampelas Walk. The property provides a 24-hour front desk as well as free WiFi. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms contain a balcony. Dago Pakar is 5.5 km from OYO 569 Cigadung Residence, while Braga City Walk is 7.1 km away. The nearest airport is Husein Sastranegara Airport, 9.7 km from the accommodation.

name: GH Universal Hotel Bandung
address: JL Setiabudhi 376, 40143 Bandung, Indonesia
description: Showcasing Italian Renaissance grandeur, GH Hotel Bandung is housed in a building located a 15-minute drive from Setiabudhi Street. It offers free Wi-Fi and parking. A rooftop cafe awaits guests. GH Universal Hotel Bandung is within one kilometer from Barli Museum and Rumah Mode Factory Outlet. Husein Sastranegara Airport is a 40-minute car ride away. Charming rooms feature marbled floors, elegant poster beds and intricate bedside lamps. Balconies overlook the pool, grounds or city. Flat-screen cable TVs and tea and coffee making facilities are provided. Guests can head for a refreshing swim in the pool or enjoy a relaxing massage in the spa. A fitness center is available for workout sessions. The hotel also offers a business center. Belle Vue Roof Top Garden Café serves light snacks and drinks while offering breathtaking city views accompanied by live jazz music. Poolside dining can be enjoyed at Courtyard of the Royal while Chinese specialties are served at Fat Dragon Restaurant.

name: Grand Cordela Hotel Bandung
address: Jl. Soekarno - Hatta No. 719 B., Ujungberung, 40294 Bandung, Indonesia
description: An outdoor pool, a restaurant and 24-hour front desk are featured at Grand Cordela Hotel Bandung. It is located 3.6 mi from Bandung Supermall. Free WiFi access is available throughout. The modern, air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, a personal safe and a seating area. There is also an electric kettle, tea/coffee making facilities and a refrigerator. Private bathroom comes with a shower, slippers and free toiletries. Other facilities at the Grand Cordela Hotel Bandung include meeting rooms and daily housekeeping. Guests can approach the concierge to arrange for car hire, shuttle service and luggage storage. Trans Studio Bandung is 3.7 mi from Grand Cordela Hotel Bandung, while Riau Street is 5 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Husein Sastranegara Airport, 8.1 mi from Grand Cordela Hotel Bandung.
